first_name: Giuseppe Luvrano BSc, MSc, PMP®, PRINCE2®,
summary:
I am a talented, ambitious and hardworking individual, with broad skills and experience in Managing construction projects and Engineering coordination, managing and leading projects.
Furthermore, I am adept at handling multiple tasks on a daily basis competently and at working well under pressure.
A key strength is communication; building strong relationships with people in order to deliver the best results.
Recently, I completed several international projects in construction rail field as well as I worked in oil&gas projects, renewable wind and solar energy projects, power substations projects and residential buildings projects. In meantime, I have successfully earned project management certifications, keeping myself constantly updating about management and technical field. In fact I have successfully earned PMI certifications, PMP and PMI-ACP both released from Project Management Institute. In addition, I have earned Prince2 Certifications, Foundation and Practitioner both released from Axelos. 
I have been traveling to many countries for work. I have been in italy, UK, Poland, Qatar, UAE, Thailand, Switzerland, Mayotte and the Netherlands. I am willing to move and live abroad as resident for work!

profile_positions.description:
Project Management of EPC for New International Meeting Facility part of European Space Agency ESA - MEP Systems and related civil-architectural interfaces. 
Issuance and monitoring the following items: 
1. Cash flow Analysis 
2. Gantt Chart & Progress S-curve 
3. Variations Analysis and claims 
4. Commercial Offer Analysis and contractual check-out 
5. Timeline analysis and monitoring 
6. Organization Chart 
7. Cost Analysis and Budget 
8. Monthly progress 
9. Technical and commercial issues
10. EoT
11. Engineering Management
12. Weekly Meeting with Client - Status Update
13. Contract/subcontract Negotiation

profile_positions.description:
Member of Construction Department related to E&M Activities within Red line North Stations of Metro Bangkok - Thailand, Mainly Leader and Coordinator of E&M costruction activities of Subcontractors. Basically the activities performed are following listed:

1. Weekly Meeting with Subcontractors - Work progress Monitoring, site issues and priority activities

2. Work Breakdown Schedule - Gantt Chart-L for each station (making, monitoring, controlling and update)

3. S-Curve progress analysis and forecast deadline schedule upgrade

4. Managing site supervisors activities, coordinate subcontractors activities, monitoring progress, facing technical issues and following priority activities 

5. Coordination of Quality inspections and T&C activities from Subcontractors

Project: Red Line Mass Transit System Project- Red line Stations
Client:  State Railway of Thailand

profile_positions.description:
Project: Jebel Ali Power Station M-Extension Project - Power Plant HVAC System.
joined the project during the ongoing construction end phase and during the commissioning start phase. 
The main role and responsibilities
Preparation and sending to Client of: 
       a. Claim Letters,
       b. Extension of Time (EoT) request, 
       c. Commissioning Manpower Deployment arrangement, 
       d.  Plan Work Schedule up to the completion of work 

Operating budget calculation, Expected Costs, Revenues and profit until work completion 

Client: Siemens AG Sheik Zayed Road (E11), Exit 25, 2154 Jebel Ali, United Arab Emirates

profile_positions.description:
EPMS Contractor for the conversion of petrobaltic jack-up drilling rig into an off-shore hydro-engineering Structure - “Petrobaltic” Rig Conversion Project. 

Responsibilities:
1.	Monitoring and execution of FATs (Factory acceptance test) of Electrical Equipment – Switchgears,
        UPS, PMCC etc..
2.   Monitoring and coordination with discipline's specialists of Technical Queries issued by Client
3.   Assignment for design supervision of Electrical and Instrumentation equipment/systems 
       of “Petrobaltic” Rig Conversion Project
4.   Interface coordination with PRS for approvals of design documentation. (PRS is Polski Rejestr 
       Statków S.A. company in charge to certify the design documentation issued by Rosetti)

profile_positions.description: Project Contract basis Tek Energy Ltd: subcontractor for the performance of Electromechanical & Groundworks for a 5 MWp Photovoltaic Project comprising the Cold Harbour Solar Plant (Client: Biosar), Subcontractor for the performance of Electromechanical & Groundworks for 4,8 MWp Photovoltaic Park (Client: ETSolutions) and for 700 kWp Photovoltaic Park (Client: British Solar Ltd) Roles: 1. Project Manager: Assignment for design supervision, construction supervison and commissioning Engineer of Electrical, Structures and Civil works of Photovoltaic Project 5 MWp, 4,8 MWp and 700 kWp 2. Monitoring of Material Delivery Plan and Site Progress Works 3. Technical advisor for Procurement phase 4. Programming and progress monitoring 5. Commissioning activities: String Test, Ohmic Continuity Test and Earthing Resistance of Earthing System, Insulation Test of LV/MV Cables, Quality controls. 6. Weekly meeting with client, subcontractors and consultant 7. Interface with the clients about emails, claim letters etc.. Built sites: 1. Photovoltaic Project comprising the Solar Plant Cold Harbour Farm,Sessay, Thirsk,YO7 3JG England - 5 MWp Client: BIOSAR ENERGY (UK) LTD | member of AKTOR Group www.biosar.co.uk 2. Photovoltaic Park Ashby-de-la-Zouch Leicestershire, LE65 2UN, U.K - 4,8 MWp Client: ET Solutions AG www.etsolutions.de 3.Solar Park in Shepshed Sewage treatment works, off Hathern Rd , Loughborough, Leicestershire LE12 9RP – 700 kWp Client: British Solar Ltd
